pages.text: Fairy bottles have various effects, depending on the bottled fairy.$(br2)Pink fairy bottles allow you to revive with your hands occupied.$(br2)Pink fairies are the rarest type of fairy, and can be found just about anywhere in the overworld. Fairy fountains contain a bunch of them.

pages.title: Fairy Bottle
pages.text: Fairies can bottled by right clicking with an empty bottle in your hand.

pages.title: Pink Fairy Bottle
pages.text: While you can have more than 2 fairy bottles in your inventory, if you die with more than that, all of them will be used upon death except for one.$(br2)Right clicking with the fairy bottle will release the fairy early, and heal you for 6 hearts instantly.

pages.title: Fairy Fountain
pages.text: Fairy fountains can be found rarely underground, where stone meets deepslate.
